1.0.1.name: wordpress/order-post
1.0.1.description:
Order Post plugin is developed for ordering the posts of a particular category in a particular sequence as we need by simply drag and drop the posts of that category . This plugin provides the shortcodes for using this plugin . you can use this plugin either in Pages , Posts , Widgets or even in comment section to use this plugin. Wherever you use as per your requirement this plugin will output the ordered posts in that area. Language Support: The plugin interface in only in English.

Some of the features added by this plugin

  • You can select the category and order the posts of that category that you have selected as per your wish.
  • Fully ajax is used for providing drag and drop facility.
  • User friendly.
  • Full explanation is given in plugin itself . So, even a new user caan also use this plugin.
